about_the_game:
MusicLayer VR is a program that allows you to manage your music without leaving your virtual reality experience. With this overlay, you can easily control your music playback without needing to take off your VR headset or fumble with the desktop view.

The program works by using virtual headphones, which enable you to effortlessly skip tracks and pause playback. For instance, removing your virtual headphones automatically pauses playback, and a double-tap on the side of your headset advances to the next track. Being entirely gesture-controlled, it provides you with the convenience of managing your music without interrupting your gameplay. This way you don't need to worry about triggering any actions with a button press while immersed in your game.

Overall, MusicLayer VR offers an effortless and seamless solution for you as a VR user to manage your music playback without breaking immersion in your virtual environments. Whether you're gaming or relaxing in VR, MusicLayer VR ensures you can enjoy your favorite music without exiting your virtual reality experience. It's an intuitive tool that caters to your needs as a music lover in the VR world, providing a convenient and enjoyable experience.

MusicLayer VR is designed to work with any music player/streaming services that supports Windows media keys. This means that you can easily listen to your favorite playlists and tracks without any interruption or issues.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
